message: Let's start fair. Take 10%, I'll take 90%. We have plenty of time to negotiate later.
I'm feeling generous, but inflation is real.  Let's make this happen now.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 60/40.  We both get a decent amount and avoid more losses from inflation.
This is my final offer. It's fair given the dwindling value.  Take it or leave it.
